required_experience: type:int minimum years required (numeric duration only) or 0
experience_gap: type:int difference between minimum experience requirement and total relevant experience in years (zero if relevant experience is more or experience is not specified)string (numeric duration only) or 0
title: string (standardized role, e.g., 'Senior Software Engineer')
location: string (city/state/country; include 'Remote', 'Hybrid', or 'On-site' when specified) or null if not specified
salary: string (exact wording including ranges/benefits, e.g. , '$120K-$150K + bonuses') or null if not specified

additional_data.education_requirements: string or null if not specified
